name: Goblin Battle - Smart TV Game
description:
Goblin Battle - Smart TV Game

War has come again to the Lowpoly Kingdom

Goblin Battle is an open work action fighting game where you play as various medieval characters fighting against dark magical creatures attacking villages. 

Gameplay:

- Enjoy smooth gameplay and amazing graphics.

- Fight the evil magic world invaders, and recapture the future of love and peace.

- Play on Smart TV Box with TV Remote Control

- Various fighting style, including hand to hand combos and various Swords combo attacks.
